episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of fascinating topics, including a daredevil pilot from the 1930s, a study on people's overestimation of their knowledge, the use of taxis in World War I, and the loud mating calls of the Gulf Corvina fish.

facts.fact: There was a showman in the 1930s whose act consisted of repeatedly crashing his plane into the ground.
A new scientific study has shown that people who claim to know a lot of facts don't actually know as many facts as they think they do.
In the first major battle of World War I, the soldiers arrived by taxi.
The Gulf Corvina fish has such loud sex that it can deafen dolphins.
